Text: Please keep in touchJust like to say that it has been great meeting and working with you all I will be leaving Enron effective July th to do investment banking in Hong Kong I will initially be based in New York and will be moving to Hong Kong after a few months Do contact me when you are in the vicinity I dont know my contact details yet and would let you know once I get it In the meantime I will always be checking my email at Please let me know what your email addresses are and keep in touch Best regards Roy

Following up with Goldman Sachs Cc Sara I work for Harry Arora and I just like to followup on whether we are ready to open an account with Goldman Sachs WebET website This is a website where they have primary issuance and secondary trading of fixed income securities I understand that Harry already spoke to you about this Please give me a call on what I can do to facilitate opening an account with Goldman Sachs because we are pursuing an aggressive deadline with regards to our Direct Finance project Best regards Roy Ibasco ext

Question about Goldman Cc Pushkar I spoke with Sara yesterday and she told me that she can expedite the process of registering for Goldman Sachs Web ET site Would you please send Sara the name and telephone number of your contact at Goldman Sachs She would need to get in touch with their legal counsel and your contact could provide her the information Many thanks Regards Roy
